nodes.text: This sauna, located on the surface of the Death Star provided enlisted men a place to relax. Beach troopers were often stationed here.
Leland Chee has stated that, while most items, like the supercoaster and Ferris Wheel are entered for fun, much of the other information is included in the Holocron continuity database, and is canon.
The inclusion of the sauna is a nod to LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy, another LucasArts game, where the spa appears in a hidden area on the Death Star.
